src:
Punya 2 Pemain Ini, Bournemouth Sanggup Tahan Manchester United?
01 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United diyakini bakal menghadapi pertandingan sulit ketika menyambangi Bournemouth, Sabtu (2/11/2019) akhir pekan ini. Duel ini penting bagi MU untuk menjaga momentum mereka.
Tim asuhan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer ini sedang dalam laju positif dengan tiga kemenangan tandang beruntun. MU mulai menemukan ritme permainan terbaik mereka, para pemain pun kian percaya diri.
Kendati demikian, Bournemouth bukan lawan mudah, apalagi di kandangnya sendiri. MU mungkin tidak bisa mengulangi kemenangan 3-2 di kandang Norwich City pada pekan sebelumnya.
Analis Sky Sports, Charlie Nicholas, yakin Bournemouth merupakan tim kuat yang bisa membawa kejutan. Seperti apa? Scroll ke bawah ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Got 2 Players, Bournemouth Can Hold Manchester United?
Nov 1 2019, 2:00 PM by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United is believed to be facing a difficult match when visited Bournemouth, Saturday (11/02/2019) this weekend. This duel is important for MU to maintain their momentum.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's team is on a positive pace with three consecutive away wins. MU began to find the rhythm of their best games, the players were increasingly confident.
Nevertheless, Bournemouth is not an easy opponent, especially at home. MU may not be able to repeat the 3-2 victory at home to Norwich City the previous week.
Sky Sports analyst Charlie Nicholas believes Bournemouth are a strong team that can bring surprises. Like what? Scroll down, Bolaneters!
